xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/SolarWinds.Reporting.Models.Selection">_x000D_linebreak <CommandText>select 'Status' as [c]_x000D_linebreak, concat('ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/images/StatusIcons/Small-',StatusLED,'"ampersandgt;ampersandlt;/ampersandgt;'_x000D_linebreak,'ampersandlt;a href="/Orion/View.aspx?View=NodeDetailsampersandamp;NetObject=N:',cast(v.volumeid as varchar),'"ampersandgt; '_x000D_linebreak,si.StatusName,'ampersandlt;/ampersandgt;') AS [v] _x000D_linebreakfrom volumes v_x000D_linebreakjoin statusinfo si on si.StatusId=v.Status_x000D_linebreakwhere volumeid=${volumeid}_x000D_linebreak _x000D_linebreakunion all ( select 'Type' as [c] , concat('ampersandlt;img src="/NetPerfMon/images/Volumes/',volumetypeicon,'"ampersandgt;ampersandlt;/ampersandgt; ' , v.VolumeType) as [v] from volumes v where volumeid=${volumeid} ) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all ( _x000D_linebreakselect 'Space Usage' as [c] _x000D_linebreak, concat( case when v.VolumePercentUsed ampersandgt; isnull(fc.criticalthreshold,gcrit.crit) then 'ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/images/StatusIcons/Small-critical.gif"ampersandgt;ampersandlt;/ampersandgt; ' _x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumePercentUsed ampersandgt; isnull(fc.criticalthreshold,gwarn.warn) then 'ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/images/StatusIcons/Small-warning.gif"ampersandgt;ampersandlt;/ampersandgt; ' _x000D_linebreakelse 'ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/images/StatusIcons/Small-up.gif"ampersandgt;ampersandlt;/ampersandgt; ' end _x000D_linebreak, round(case when v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1099511627776 then (v.volumespaceused/1099511627776) _x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1073741824 then (v.volumespaceused/1073741824) _x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1048576 then (v.volumespaceused/1048576) _x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1024 then (v.volumespaceused/1024) _x000D_linebreakelse v.volumespaceused end,2) _x000D_linebreak, case when v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1099511627776 then ' TB ' _x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1073741824 then ' GB ' _x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1048576 then ' MB ' _x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1024 then ' KB ' _x000D_linebreakelse ' Bytes ' end _x000D_linebreak, ' used (',round(v.VolumePercentUsed,0),'%) of ' _x000D_linebreak, round(case when v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1099511627776 then (v.VolumeSize/1099511627776) _x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1073741824 then (v.VolumeSize/1073741824) _x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1048576 then (v.VolumeSize/1048576)_x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1024 then (v.VolumeSize/1024)_x000D_linebreakelse v.volumespaceused_x000D_linebreakend,2)_x000D_linebreak, case when v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1099511627776 then ' TB '_x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1073741824 then ' GB '_x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1048576 then ' MB '_x000D_linebreakwhen v.VolumeSize ampersandgt; 1024 then ' KB '_x000D_linebreakelse ' Bytes '_x000D_linebreakend_x000D_linebreak,' total size')_x000D_linebreakas [v]_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakfrom volumes v_x000D_linebreakcross join (Select CurrentValue AS crit FROM Settings WHERE SettingID = 'NetPerfMon-DiskSpace-Error') gcrit_x000D_linebreakcross join (Select CurrentValue AS warn FROM Settings WHERE SettingID = 'NetPerfMon-DiskSpace-Warning') gwarn_x000D_linebreakleft join ForecastCapacitySettings fc on fc.InstanceId=v.VolumeID and fc.MetricId = 3_x000D_linebreakwhere volumeid=${volumeid}_x000D_linebreak) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all (_x000D_linebreakselect 'Warning Threshold' as [c] , case when fc.warningthreshold is not null then (concat(fc.warningthreshold,'% (Custom)')) else (concat(gwarn.warn,'% (Default)')) end as [v]_x000D_linebreakfrom volumes v _x000D_linebreakcross join (Select CurrentValue AS warn FROM Settings WHERE SettingID = 'NetPerfMon-DiskSpace-Warning') gwarn_x000D_linebreakleft join ForecastCapacitySettings fc on fc.InstanceId=v.VolumeID and fc.MetricId = 3_x000D_linebreakwhere volumeid=${volumeid}_x000D_linebreak) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all (_x000D_linebreakselect 'Critical Threshold' as [c] , case when fc.criticalthreshold is not null then (concat(fc.criticalthreshold,'% (Custom)')) else (concat(gcrit.crit,'% (Default)')) end as [v]_x000D_linebreakfrom volumes v_x000D_linebreakcross join (Select CurrentValue AS crit FROM Settings WHERE SettingID = 'NetPerfMon-DiskSpace-Error') gcrit_x000D_linebreakleft join ForecastCapacitySettings fc on fc.InstanceId=v.VolumeID and fc.MetricId = 3_x000D_linebreakwhere volumeid=${volumeid}_x000D_linebreak) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all ( select 'Last Polled' as [c] , cast(max(vp.DateTime) as nvarchar) as [v] from volumes v _x000D_linebreakjoin VolumePerformance vp on vp.VolumeID=v.VolumeID _x000D_linebreakwhere v.volumeid=${volumeid} group by v.volumeid ) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all ( select 'Polling Interval' as [c] , concat(cast(v.PollInterval as nvarchar),' seconds') as [v] from volumes v where v.volumeid=${volumeid} ) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all ( select 'Statistics Interval' as [c] , concat(cast(v.StatCollection as nvarchar),' minutes') as [v] from volumes v where v.volumeid=${volumeid} )_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all ( select 'Rediscovery Interval' as [c] , concat(cast(v.RediscoveryInterval as nvarchar),' minutes') as [v] from volumes v where v.volumeid=${volumeid} )_x000D_linebreak</CommandText>_x000D_linebreak <DynamicSelectionType>Undefined</DynamicSelectionType>_x000D_linebreak <EntityUri xmlns:d2p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" />_x000D_linebreak <Filter i:nil="true" />_x000D_linebreak <MasterEntity>Orion.Volumes</MasterEntity>_x000D_linebreak <Name>Current Volume</Name>_x000D_linebreak <NetObjectId>V:162180</NetObjectId>_x000D_linebreak
